panels.title: Average Request rate per endpoint for $adc_app

panels.description: This is the sum of container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total / container_cpu_cfs_periods_total
panels.title: Average Container CPU Throttling Percentage

panels.description:
This is the container_cpu_usage_seconds_total rate per container for pods $adc_podlist.

This translates to cpu millisecond used per 1000milliseconds. 1 ms/second = 1 millicore
panels.title: Container CPU Core Usage

panels.description: This is the container_memory_working_set_bytes usage per container for pods $adc_podlist.
panels.title: Container Memory Usage

panels.description:
This is the container_cpu_cfs_throttled_seconds_total  per container for pods $adc_podlist. 

This represents the amount of millisceconds per 1000 milliseconds that a container has been throttled
panels.title: Container CPU Throttling

panels.description: This is the container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total / container_cpu_cfs_periods_total for pods $adc_podlist.
panels.title: Container CPU Throttling Percentage

panels.description:
What, in Volume, is being written to kafka by ADC. kafka_producer_record_send_rate

PM Stats files are being split up into individual records, so one PM stats file may generate between 80 to 200 records.
